Html:
Hello. Thank you for your great work.

I have 2 versions source. One is old (about 10 months ago) and the other is latest.

I have two maps ﻿﻿inherited from GMapControl and they are child form.

suppose two maps are overlapped partially and map#1 is activated.

when I move mouse on map#2, map#2 is activated and display to front.

How can I prevent this function and activate the form when I just click?

Source I had last year (sorry. How can I get verson info? ) is activated when only I click the form.

Please help me.
